title: Arcade Riven
body: The only skin i have owned for riven is arcade. When selected for the game, and i use it, the next game i select riven, the skin resets to default, and i have to pick the skin again instead of automatically choosing the last used skin like on every other champion

replies.body:
Hey Harry Rekt Em,

Thanks for the report! This doesn't only affect Arcade Riven. We're aware of an issue where champion select isn't remembering the last skin that was used.
